mapper.insert: insert into matewrite(no, pno, userid, area, matePic1, deposit, rent, enterdate, minStay, maxStay, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')writedate, enddate, matestate, mateProfile) values (housematesq.nextval, #{pno}, #{userid}, #{area}, #{matePic1}, #{deposit}, #{rent}, #{enterdate}, #{minStay}, #{maxStay}, sysdate, sysdate+7, '모집중', #{mateProfile} )
mapper.update: update matewrite set matePic1=#{matePic1}, deposit=#{deposit}, rent=#{rent}, enterdate=#{enterdate}, minStay=#{minStay}, maxStay=#{maxStay}, mateProfile=#{mateProfile} where userid=#{userid} and pno=#{pno}
mapper.select: select no, pno, userid, area, matePic1, deposit, rent, enterdate, minStay, maxStay, writedate, enddate, matestate, mateProfile from matewrite where userid=#{param1}
select matePic1 from matewrite where userid=#{param1} and no=#{param2}
mapper.delete: delete from matewrite where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
